Package appointmentmaker

Class CustomerHelpers

java.lang.Object
appointmentmaker.CustomerHelpers
public class CustomerHelpers extends Object
This class contains functions designed to abstract the functionality of creating, modifying, deleting, and viewing customers.

      Parameters:
      address - the address
      Returns:
      a formatted address including the country and address

    • customerTableColumnName

      public String customerTableColumnName(String attribute)
      This function formats all columns for the customer table into a more user-friendly format without all the underscores. Any single word attributes are just passed along directly.

      Lambda function in switch statement added to reduce the size of the switch statement.

      Parameters:
      attribute - the unformatted column name
      Returns:
      the formatted column name

    • getNextCsrId

      public int getNextCsrId()
      Finds the current highest csr ID and return the next lowest unique ID
      Returns:
      the lowest unique customer ID

    • getCustomer

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<String> getCustomer(int id)
      Gets a customers information given their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the customer
      Returns:
      the customer information

    • addCustomer

      public void addCustomer(String csrID, String name, String division, String address, String postalCode, String phone, String createdBy, String currentUser)
      This function adds a customer to the database.
      Parameters:
      csrID - the customers ID
      name - customers name
      division - first level division where the customer lives
      address - customers address
      postalCode - customers zip code
      phone - customers phone number
      createdBy - who created the customer
      currentUser - who last updated the customer

    • deleteCustomer

      public void deleteCustomer(String id)
      This function removes all appointments for a given customer, then deletes the customer from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - the Customer_ID of the customer being deleted
